column5: Solopaddler did a great job at describing our trip....I thought I'd add a few of my favourite pics taken from my camera.  Solo posted this Bass...but I loved the rock wall background in this one....   Here's a neat pic of a pike I was bringing in....   Here's some of the wildlife we saw.  Figures that a few of them were on top of garbage in this remote area.....          Finally...some scenery pics....      In case you missed the videos on the other thread...here they are again....  Cabin and Storm <embed width="448" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" src="http://i120.photobucket.com/player.swf?file=http://vid120.photobucket.com/albums/o185/ccmtcanada/solopaddlerstorm.flv">  Solo landing his fav species. <embed width="448" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" src="http://i120.photobucket.com/player.swf?file=http://vid120.photobucket.com/albums/o185/ccmtcanada/solopaddlerpike.flv">  Thanks everyone for your replies on the other thread....it certainly was a trip to remember!
pics dont work   sounds like an awesome report tho
Fixed now!!! LOL
Those moose shots are incredible, what a huge animal that was!
nice pics lol
Excellent pics Cliff!!!  I'm jealous!!!   ... again!
Fabulous pic of he moose Cliff.  Great videos too.  Looks like you guys had an awesome trip.  Joey
looks like the two of u enjoyed yourselves. thanks for the report.
great shots dude dont you love the great north minus the old stinker cabin  but again it was a good place to keep out of the storm
oooohhhhhh sooooo jealoussssss....love the wildlife pics...ESPECIALLY the moose.  NICE!!!!!!!! PS that is one nice bass!
Looks like CCMT has the artistic eye out of the two. Lovely shots!

So ummmm don't take this the wrong way or anything but you guys are catching fish like that and you came HOME before freeze up? What is wrong with you LOL!!!!!  I am sorry but as long as I had money in the bank or credit avaiable I would staying where ever that was!!!! But then again both of my jobs are easily replaceable.... Seeing stuff like is the reason I DON'T take holidays anymore they would never get to go back to work.
Atta Boy Cliff!
PRICELESS......  great pics and videos.... thanks for sharing! Leechman
Very nice pics. That is a great shot of the smallmouth.
great report neat pics
Beauty Pics, that moose is HUGE. Looked like you and Solo had a blast. Congrats and thanks for the report. Love the Cochrane area.  Cheers, 1leg
looks like you guys had a great time the moose shot is priceless
Congrats on another great trip guys...wish I could have gone.  Sorry to hear about the lack of fish north of Cochrane.  Never get sick of looking at the scenery from up that way!!  Jason
some nice pics!
